item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/14-decoupling-peer-review-publishing/#comment-2854">Janne Sepp채nen</a>.
We don't say that, just that it's based on the same core principles.

In reply to Janne Sepp채nen.

We don’t say that, just that it’s based on the same core principles.

item.title: By: Janne Sepp채nen
item.dc:creator: Janne Sepp채nen
item.description:
Hmm, I would strongly disagree that peerageofscience.org could be callef "traditional peer review" : Open Engagement, Peer-review-of-peer-review, Concurrent Consideration by multiple journals?
Also, Peerage of Science is free for scientists (journals pay)
item.content:encoded:
Hmm, I would strongly disagree that peerageofscience.org could be callef “traditional peer review” : Open Engagement, Peer-review-of-peer-review, Concurrent Consideration by multiple journals?

Also, Peerage of Science is free for scientists (journals pay)
